column1: L, Associate Of Matt Gaetz Abruptly Resigns From Lobbying Firm, David, 2021-04-11,
column2: A longtime associate of Rep. Matt Gaetz (R-FL) has resigned his position at a prestigious lobbying firm amid the allegations of sex trafficking that are scandalizing the congressman.
column3: WKMG reported that Chris Dorworth stepped down from Ballard Partners on Friday. He had been with the firm since losing his Florida House seat in 2012.
column4: “The current political climate is nasty and I told Brian I don't think its fair for the recent media storm to take away from their missions" Dorworth explained in a tweet on Friday referring to Brian Ballard president of the lobbying firm.
column5: Dorworth's biography and photo have since been scrubbed from the Ballard Partners website.
column6: In a tweet last year Gaetz and Dorworth were seen in a photo with Joel Greenberg who is facing sex trafficking and dozens of other federal charges. He is expected to enter into a plea deal his attorney has said. @mattgaetz and @ChrisDorworth duckface and all. #WhiteHouse pic.twitter.com/oIAzfXgkCh
column8: Intelligence analyst Eric Garland pointed out that Ballard has been former President Donald Trump's "lobbyist of choice in Florida."
column9: In addition to being Trump's lobbyist of choice in Florida who are Ballard Partners?
column10: Well. It's both a long story and a fairly easy one: https://t.co/8f9OJ0tOk1
